item.title: Anthropic and Accenture sign multi-year AI strategic partnership
item.description: The two companies are launching the Accenture Anthropic Business Group to bring Anthropic's AI to Accenture's employees.

item.title: Spotify launches music videos in the U.S. and Canada for Premium subscribers
item.description: Spotify will let you switch between music videos and audio at any time.

item.title: Mistral AI surfs vibe coding tailwinds with new coding models

item.title: Empromptu raises $2M pre-seed to help enterprises build AI apps
